mapper.insert: INSERT into user_mentee (menteeNo, mentee_id, passwd, name, region, age, nickname, lngName, mNo, mNum, type) values (#{menteeNo}, #{mentee_id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{region}, #{age}, #{nickname}, #{lngName}, #{mNo}, #{mNum}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_mentee ORDER BY menteeNo ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE user_mentee SET mentee_id = #{mentee_id}, passwd = #{passwd}, region = #{region}, nickname = #{nickname}, lngName = #{lngName} where menteeNo = #{menteeNo}
